00015 namespace MeCab {
00016 
00017 template <class T1, class T2> T1 repeat_find_if(T1 b, T1 e,
00018                                                 const T2& v, size_t n) {
00019   T1 r = b;
00020   for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00021     r = std::find(b, e, v);
00022     if (r == e) return e;
00023     b = r + 1;
00024   }
00025   return r;
00026 }
00027 
00028 // NOTE: first argment:   answer,
00029 //       second argment:  system output
00030 inline bool node_cmp_eq(const LearnerNode &node1,
00031                         const LearnerNode &node2,
00032                         size_t size, size_t unk_size) {
00033   if (node1.length == node2.length &&
00034       strncmp(node1.surface, node2.surface, node1.length) == 0) {
00035     const char *p1 = node1.feature;
00036     const char *p2 = node2.feature;
00037     // There is NO case when node1 becomes MECAB_UNK_NODE
00038     if (node2.stat == MECAB_UNK_NODE)
00039       size = unk_size;  // system cannot output other extra information
00040     const char *r1 = repeat_find_if(p1, p1 + std::strlen(p1), ',', size);
00041     const char *r2 = repeat_find_if(p2, p2 + std::strlen(p2), ',', size);
00042     if (static_cast<size_t>(r1 - p1) == static_cast<size_t>(r2 - p2) &&
00043         std::strncmp(p1, p2, static_cast<size_t>(r1 - p1)) == 0) {
00044       return true;
00045     }
00046   }
00047 
00048   return false;
00049 }
00050 
00051 inline bool is_empty(LearnerPath *path) {
00052   return((!path->rnode->rpath && path->rnode->stat != MECAB_EOS_NODE) ||
00053          (!path->lnode->lpath && path->lnode->stat != MECAB_BOS_NODE) );
00054 }
00055 
00056 inline void calc_expectation(LearnerPath *path, double *expected, double Z) {
00057   if ( is_empty(path) ) return;
00058 
00059   double c = std::exp(path->lnode->alpha +
00060                       path->cost +
00061                       path->rnode->beta - Z);
00062 
00063   for (const int *f = path->fvector; *f != -1; ++f) {
00064     expected[*f] += c;
00065   }
00066 
00067   if (path->rnode->stat != MECAB_EOS_NODE) {
00068     for (const int *f = path->rnode->fvector; *f != -1; ++f) {
00069       expected[*f] += c;
00070     }
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 inline void calc_online_update(LearnerPath *path, double *expected) {
00075   if ( is_empty(path) ) return;
00076 
00077   for (const int *f = path->fvector; *f != -1; ++f) {
00078     expected[*f] += 1.0;
00079   }
00080 
00081   if (path->rnode->stat != MECAB_EOS_NODE) {
00082     for (const int *f = path->rnode->fvector; *f != -1; ++f) {
00083       expected[*f] += 1.0;
00084     }
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 inline void calc_alpha(LearnerNode *n) {
00090   n->alpha = 0.0;
00091   for (LearnerPath *path = n->lpath; path; path = path->lnext)
00092     n->alpha = logsumexp(n->alpha,
00093                          path->cost + path->lnode->alpha,
00094                          path == n->lpath);
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline void calc_beta(LearnerNode *n) {
00098   n->beta = 0.0;
00099   for (LearnerPath *path = n->rpath; path; path = path->rnext)
00100     n->beta = logsumexp(n->beta,
00101                         path->cost + path->rnode->beta,
00102                         path == n->rpath);
00103 }
00104 }
